thread.title: Kristina Ravn Larsen
thread.title_full: Life Ionizers reviewed by Kristina Ravn Larsen

author: Kristina Ravn Larsen
title: Kristina Ravn Larsen
text:
Several years ago, I saw an ad in a window downtown for Alkaline water. I went in and began purchasing two gallons at a time. After several months of drinking the water and reading about all the benefits of an alkaline system, I decided to research the market for purchasing a machine for my home.
I began to research the top three companies. In my final analysis, it was an easy choice. The Life Ionizer, was ahead of the other in technology, options, maintenance, warranty and the units had a sleek appearance.
The company was friendly, patiently answered all my questions and were there to assist.
You cannot put a price on your health; it is #1. I feel I paid a fair price and am extremely glad I made this investment. This is the only water I drink.
Kristina Larsen
Owner/Principal Broker
Luxury Homes Int'l.
